Replaced with Hongdu K-8W jet trainers. |- | de Havilland Canada DHC-3 Otter | | Military transport aircraft | | 1 | Ex Indian Air Force. |- | Douglas Dakota | | Military transport aircraft | | 1 | Ex Indian Air Force. |- | Fouga CM.170 Magister | | Jet Trainer | | 19 | Retired in favor of more capable Aero L-39 Albatros. |- | F-7 Air Guard | | Fighter aircraft | MB | 10 | Retired in favor of more capable F-7BGI. |- | Nanchang A-5 | | Ground attack/Close air support | C | 8 | Retired on 4 November 2014 |- | North American F-86 Sabre | | Fighter aircraft | F40 | 8 | Surrendered by Pakistan Air Force. |- | Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-21 | | Fighter aircraft | MF | 12 | |- | Shenyang F-5 | | Interceptor aircraft | | 8 | |- | Shenyang FT-5 | | Interceptor aircraft | | 3 | |- | Shenyang F-6 | | OCU | | 34 | FT-6 still in service |- !
